messages.title: BlockChain Laboratory
messages.head_description: Signal9 studies blockchain and develops various solutions for activating blockchain.
messages.services_title_description: List of services and solutions provided by the Signal9.
messages.services_1_description: Secure validation for blockchain smart contracts. Provides a smart contract auto-validation solution for auto-verifiable items.
messages.services_2_description: Act as a proxy to create blockchain smart contracts to meet your business needs.
messages.services_3_description: Various developer tools are available for various IDE for blockchain smart contracts. The tool provides features such as smart contract deployment and validation to blockchain.
messages.services_4_description: Blockchain API Gateway is provided to make the use of blockchain easy for specific services (token issue, coupon, local currency).
messages.audit_title_discription: We are verifying smart contracts based on the know-how we gained from various research such as analyzing existing hacking incidents.
messages.audit_1_description: Validation solutions allow developers to automatically validate their smart contracts on some items before putting them on the blockchain mainnet.
messages.audit_2_description: The web interface allows verification to proceed without installing complex development tools locally.
messages.audit_3_description: After validation, you can proceed with the deployment to the main(test)net via the appropriate Web solution.
messages.audit_4_description: You can be notified by email of the results that occur during the deployment or verification process.
messages.audit_5_description: We can see the automatic and manual verification results reports that experts have performed.
messages.audit_question: Would you like to try the validation tool? (Icon blockchain support)
messages.apigateway_discription: Blockchain technology is a new technology that enables a new business model. The blockchain API gateway of the Signal9 provides the ability to incorporate blockchain technology with minimal modification of the existing process.
messages.newsletter_discription: This is an email newsletter for the latest information on Signal9.
messages.partners_discription: SignalNine is working with the following partners
messages.contact_notice1: Please leave your name and enquiry below and I'll contact you.
messages.contact_notice2: If you have any questions, please contact us by email or messenger below.
messages.footer_info1: Signal9 is a company that studies blockchain technology.
messages.footer_info2: Signal9 is contributing to the activation of blockchain technology by developing solutions for blockchain.
messages.author: @wiziple
